Politics 1.  The unfortunate friction to crisp, quality decision making.
Politics 2.  The distraction or side show on the way to getting things done.
The more complicated the issue the more you need to get to the crux. 140 characters seems just right.
Health 1.  Everyone agrees with portability and guaranteed coverage for pre-existing conditions.  DONE.
Health 2.  Basic care for everyone should = current spend/waste by using Emergency Rooms for basic care.  DONE.
Health 3.  Everyone agrees we shouldn't spend 110% of GNP on healthcare.  DONE.
Health 4.  The real disagreement is do I help my neighbor who can't afford care.
Health 5.  Repubs like free markets, every man for himself.  Dems like controlled markets, help my neighbor.
Health 6.  If we Americans want to give up on our neighbors, that's our call, sadly.
Health 7.  Pass the easy stuff in one bill.  Crystallize the tough stuff in the second bill.
Health 8.  Listen to the President tonight.  Fox, be ashamed.
